authors.name: Laura  Smith
authors.affiliation: Department of Clinical and Movement Neurosciences, Queen Square Institute of Neurology, University College London (UCL)

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"82gdk","text":"SH-SY5Y cells were transfected with a pcDNA3.1 vector plasmid. Stable transfection was performed using the XtremeGENE reagent for 72 hours, and 400 µg/ml G418 antibiotics used as the selection marker . Colonies were selected and expanded for routine culture in growth media supplemented with G418. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2blhq","text":"Plate SH-SY5Y cells in 10mm2dish approximately 24 hours before transfection, making sure cells are at optimal concentration (70–90 % confluency).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":27,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ej6pc","text":"Allow      X-tremeGENE™ HP DNA Transfection Reagent, DNA and diluent (Opti:MEM®I      Reduced Serum Medium or serum-free medium) to warm to +15 °C to +25 °C,      and vortex gently.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":78,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ddts0","text":"Place      diluent in a sterile tube.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f1otk","text":"Add      plasmid DNA (2 µg) . Gently pipette up and down to mix.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cg9gl","text":"Add      2 µL X-tremeGENE™ HP DNA Transfection Reagent to the diluted DNA.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ldu0","text":"Vortex      the mixture.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e6ojo","text":"Incubate      for 15 minutes at +15 °C to +25 °C.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"68akf","text":"Add      transfection complex to the cells in a dropwise manner.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"750sj","text":"Gently      shake or swirl the wells or flasks to ensure even distribution over the  entire plate.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ojvf","text":"Incubate      cells for 72 hours before replacing with complete SH-SY5Y culture media (dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.bp2l617jzvqe/v1) supplemented with 400 µg/ml      G418 antibiotics and incubated at 37°C and 5% CO2 for selection.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":218,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9je13","text":"Growth medium with selection reagent was replaced every 2-3 days. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4vse","text":"After ensuring all mock transfections had died, colonies from the transfected cells were selected with sterile cloning cylinders. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"q20a","text":"Colonies were transferred to 6 well plates and maintain in growth medium containing G418. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"10ji3","text":"Once confluent, cells were trypsinised and expanded into a 10mm2dish in 10 mL normal growth media. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":63,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4djm2","text":"Clones were frozen down or pelleted for characterisation.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: X-tremeGENE™ HP DNA Transfection Reagent Protocol for transfection of SH-SY5Y cells
title_html: X-tremeGENE™ HP DNA Transfection Reagent Protocol for transfection of SH-SY5Y cells

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"erqvr","text":"This is a genetic manipulation procedure and as such must have      been approved by the GM Committee to cover the plasmid, inserted DNA,      cells to be transfected and person performing the experiment.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6egf9","text":"Only specific rooms are covered for these experiments (see the      departmental safety codes of practice).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"atngc","text":"Make sure you are familiar with these safety documents, and in      particular the protocols relating to spillages and decontamination.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
